00027 using System.Web;

00031 namespace Utilities.Web.PingBack
00032 {
00036     public static class TrackBack
00037     {
00038         #region Public Static Functions
00039 
00040 
00041 
00042 
00043         public static void SendTrackBack(TrackBackMessage Message)
00044         {
00045             if (Message == null)
00046                 throw new ArgumentException("Message can not be null.");
00047             try
00048             {
00049                 GetTrackBackURL(Message);
00050                 HttpWebRequest Request = (HttpWebRequest)System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Create(Message.NotificationURL);
00051                 Request.Credentials = CredentialCache.DefaultNetworkCredentials;
00052                 Request.Timeout = 10000;
00053                 Request.Method = "POST";
00054                 Request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";
00055                 Request.ContentLength = Message.ToString().Length;
00056                 Request.KeepAlive = false;
00057                 using (StreamWriter Writer = new StreamWriter(Request.GetRequestStream()))
00058                 {
00059                     Writer.Write(Message.ToString());
00060                 }
00061                 HttpWebResponse Response = (HttpWebResponse)Request.GetResponse();
00062                 string ResponseText = "";
00063                 using (System.IO.StreamReader Reader = new System.IO.StreamReader(Response.GetResponseStream()))
00064                 {
00065                     ResponseText = Reader.ReadToEnd();
00066                 }
00067                 if (Response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.OK)
00068                 {
00069                     if (!ResponseText.Contains("<error>0</error>"))
00070                     {
00071                         throw new Exception(ResponseText);
00072                     }
00073                 }
00074                 else
00075                 {
00076                     throw new Exception("HTTP Error occurred: " + Response.StatusCode.ToString());
00077                 }
00078             }
00079             catch (Exception e)
00080             {
00081                 throw e;
00082             }
00083         }
00084 
00090         public static TrackBackMessage GetTrackBack(HttpContext Context)
00091         {
00092             return GetTrackBack(Context.Request);
00093         }
00094 
00100         public static TrackBackMessage GetTrackBack(HttpRequest Request)
00101         {
00102             TrackBackMessage Message = new TrackBackMessage();
00103             Message.Title = Request.Params["title"];
00104             Message.ID = Request.Params["id"];
00105             Message.Excerpt = Request.Params["excerpt"];
00106             Message.BlogName = Request.Params["blog_name"];
00107             if (Request.Params["url"] != null)
00108                 Message.PostUrl = new Uri(Request.Params["url"].Split(',')[0]);
00109             return Message;
00110         }
00111 
00116         public static void SendSuccess(HttpContext Context)
00117         {
00118             SendSuccess(Context.Response);
00119         }
00120 
00125         public static void SendSuccess(HttpResponse Response)
00126         {
00127             Response.Write("<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"iso-8859-1\"?><response><error>0</error></response>");
00128         }
00129         
00135         public static void SendError(HttpContext Context, string ErrorMessage)
00136         {
00137             SendError(Context.Response, ErrorMessage);
00138         }
00139 
00145         public static void SendError(HttpResponse Response, string ErrorMessage)
00146         {
00147             Response.Write("<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"iso-8859-1\"?><response><error>" + ErrorMessage + "</error></response>");
00148         }
00149         #endregion
00150 
00151         #region Private Static Functions
00152         private static readonly Regex TrackBackLink = new Regex("trackback:ping=\"([^\"]+)\"", RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.Compiled);
00153         private static readonly Regex TrackBackID = new Regex("id=([^\"]+)", RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.Compiled);
00154 
00155         private static void GetTrackBackURL(TrackBackMessage Message)
00156         {
00157             using (WebClient Client = new WebClient())
00158             {
00159                 Client.Headers.Add("User-Agent", "Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 6.0)");
00160                 string TempContent = Client.DownloadString(Message.NotificationURL);
00161                 string TempURL =TrackBackLink.Match(TempContent).Groups[1].ToString().Trim();
00162                 Uri TempURI;
00163                 Uri.TryCreate(TempURL,UriKind.Absolute,out TempURI);
00164                 Message.NotificationURL=TempURI;
00165 
00166                 TempURL = TrackBackID.Match(TempURL).Groups[1].ToString().Trim();
00167                 Message.ID = TempURL;
00168             }
00169         }
00170         #endregion
00171     }

00258 
00259         public override string ToString()
00260         {
00261             string First = "&";
00262             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(NotificationURL.Query))
00263                 First = "?";
00264             return First + "title=" + Title + "&url=" + PostUrl + "&excerpt=" + Excerpt + "&blog_name=" + BlogName;
00265         }
00266         #endregion
00267     }
